card_description: A component providing dynamic background effects like gradient blobs and interactive particles. This is a system-level component.

modal_content.text: This component provides the dynamic background effects for the main page. It is loaded automatically and combines two layers: soft, animated gradient blobs and an interactive particle network using `particles.js`.
This HTML is automatically injected into the main page's `<body>` to create the containers for the effects.
This CSS styles the background blobs, making them large, blurry, and positioned behind all content.

This script initializes the `particles.js` library. It must be run after the `
` has been added to the page. It requires the `particles.js` library to be included in the main `index.html` file.
